DOC.brief_summary: Study medication treatment Schizophrenia patient already take Abilify , Risperdal , Seroquel , Zyprexa
DOC.brief_title: A Combination Two Currently Approved Drugs Enhance Treatment Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Must clinical diagnosis Schizophrenia Must least 18 year age old 55 year age Must stable dose Abilify , Risperdal , Seroquel , Zyprexa past 8 week Women childbearing potential must use medically accept mean contraception Must able swallow capsule Has serious health problem Schizophrenia Takes antidepressant depression Takes insulin diabetes Have history alcohol drug dependence ( except nicotine caffeine ) within past 6 month
